name: Dan-Gun
meaning: Dan-Gun is named after the holy Dan-Gun, the legendary founder of Korea in 2333 B.C.

moves.title: Parallel ready stance
moves.description: Parallel ready stance facing 12 o'clock.

moves.title: Knife-hand guarding block
moves.description: Turn 90° left to 9 o'clock into right l-stance. Middle knife-hand guarding block.

moves.title: High stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance. High punch.

moves.title: Knife-hand guarding block
moves.description: Pivot 180° right to 3 o'clock into left l-stance. Knife-hand guarding block.

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Step forward into left walking stance. High punch.

moves.title: Low outer forearm block
moves.description: Pivot on thr right foot 90° left to 12 o'clock into left walking stance. Low outer forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so najunde bakat palmok makgi

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance. High punch.

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Step forward into left walking stance. High punch.

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance. High punch.

moves.title: Twin outer forearm block
moves.description: Pivot 270° left to 3 o'clock into right l-stance. Twin outer forearm block.

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance. High punch.

moves.title: Twin outer forearm block
moves.description: Pivot 180° right to 9 o'clock into left l-stance. Twin outer forearm block.

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Step forward into left walking stance. High punch.

moves.title: Low outer forearm block
moves.description: Turn 90° left to 6 o'clock into left walking stance. Low outer forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so najunde bakat palmok makgi

moves.title: Rising block
moves.description: Rising outer forearm block on the spot in left walking stance.

moves.title: Rising block
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock into right walking stance. Rising outer forearm block.

moves.title: Rising block
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock into left walking stance. Rising outer forearm block.

moves.title: Rising block
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock into right walking stance. Rising outer forearm block.

moves.title: Knifehand strike
moves.description: Pivot 270° left to 3 o'clock into right l-stance. Knife-hand side strike.

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance. High punch.

moves.title: Knifehand strike
moves.description: Pivot 180° right to 9 o'clock into left l-stance. Knife-hand side strike.

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Step forward to 9 o'clock into left walking stance. High punch.

moves.title: Parallel ready stance
moves.description: Pivot on the right foot 90° left to face 12 o'clock. Return the left foot to parallel ready stance
